front.title: RPKI Multiple "All Resources" Trust Anchors Applicability Statement

abstract.t: This document provides an applicability statement for the use of multiple, over-claiming 'all resources' (0/0) RPKI certificate authorities (CA) certificates used as trust anchors (TAs) operated by the Regional Internet Registry community to help mitigate the risk of massive downstream invalidation in the case of transient registry inconsistencies.
